result.execSummary:
The defendant was charged with both Operating w/ PAC (4th w/in 5 yrs) [Modifiers: Alcohol Fine Enhancer] and OWI (4th w/in 5 yrs) [Modifiers: Alcohol Fine Enhancer]. The defendant was found guilty of Operating w/ PAC (4th w/in 5 yrs) [Modifiers: Alcohol Fine Enhancer] and the other charge, OWI (4th w/in 5 yrs) [Modifiers: Alcohol Fine Enhancer] was dismissed by the court.

  • Anthony P. Pedretti was found guilty of Operating w/ PAC (4th w/in 5 yrs) [Modifiers: Alcohol Fine Enhancer], a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 346.63(1)(b).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

No consumption or possession of alcohol.  No entering taverns, bars or liquor stores for any purpose.

Defendant to participate in and comply with all requirements of OWI Treatment Court.

To pay costs of OWI Treatment Ccourt.

Defendant to pay supervision fees as determined by the Department of Corrections.

timeConds.notes:
100 days conditional jail imposed - up to 75% of time may be served on EMP if approved by OWI  Court Team.

Additional 100 days conditional jail imposed and stayed - to be imposed as determined by OWI Treatment Court without a hearing.

**11/7/2014 - JOC amended to reflect 4 days sentence credit.
Consecutive to: Consecutive to 14CM107
